properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Hongera hongera-
Bwana harusi hongera
na bibi harusi. x2
Kwa kujongea altare yake Bwana
upendo wenu mmeudhihirisha
muishi kwa amani siku zote
katika nyumba yenu.
Mungu awabariki awalinde
maisha yenu yote.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Tunawatakia he-ri,
salama na amani,
shikeni agano lenu,
kwa uaminifu.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Mungu awajalie-ni,
baraka na rehema,
wajalieni watoto
walo watakatifu.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Leo mmedhihiri-sha,
upendo thabiti,
alounganisha Mungu,
yasitenganishwe.
